effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
